PHRASE.LANG: kName
Face-hugging Coconut Crab (Men)
Crabe de cocotier agrippeur de visage (homme)
Gesichtsumarmende Kokosnuss-Krabbe (für Männer)
Granchio da noce di cocco avvinghiato al viso (da uomo)
Cangrejo cocotero en la cara (hombre)
顔に貼り付いたヤシガニ（男性）
얼굴에 달라붙은 야자게(남성)
Coconut Crab Attached onto Face (Men)
黏在臉上的椰子蟹(男用)
黏在臉上的椰子蟹(男用)
Face-hugging Coconut Crab (Men)
kDesc
All of a sudden, there's this huge coconut crab on your face.\nIt looks like it's absorbing something too... [#Legal]
Soudainement, un gigantesque crabe de cocotier se retrouve sur votre tête.\nOn dirait qu'il absorbe quelque chose aussi... [#Legal]
Ganz plötzlich hast du diese riesige Kokosnuss-Krabbe auf deinem Gesicht.\nEs scheint auch etwas zu absorbieren... [#Legal]
Un granchio da noce di cocco avvinghiatosi al viso da un momento all'altro.\nPare che stia proprio cercando di risucchiare qualcosa... [#Legal]
De repente, hay un enorme cangrejo cocotero en tu cara.\nParece que está absorbiendo algo... [#Legal]
気付くと顔面に張り付いていたヤシガニ。\n何かを吸われているようにしか見えない… [#Legal]
어느샌가 얼굴에 붙어있던 야자게. \n뭔가를 흡수당하고 있는 것으로밖엔 보이지 않는다.... [#Legal]
A coconut crab that sticks on the face out of the blue.\nIt looks nothing apart from being sucked by something... [#Legal]
不知不覺間黏在臉上的椰子蟹。\n看來只像被什麼吸啜著。[#Legal]
不知不覺間黏在臉上的椰子蟹。\n看來只像被什麼吸啜著。[#Legal]
All of a sudden, there's this huge coconut crab on your face.\nIt looks like it's absorbing something too... [#Legal]
